name: Akikrat Samajik Suraksha Chetna Sansthan
briefDescription: OASiS is A Social Innovations Laboratory, to innovate solutions for long standing social issues and problems, and pilot them. Individuals, Groups and Corporates bring their identified problems to the Lab, design innovative solutions, and implement them. Since 2003, OASiS has developed 7 models addressing problems across the sector. 1 of them has been implemented nationally by Govt f India, 1 has been adopted by a State Govt, 1 is being implemented by Universities internationally and nationally, 3 are being implemented by other NGOs, 1 is at the Pilot stage. The Lab has also mentored 6 Social Entrepreneurs, all of whom are piloting their solutions. Almost all models have received international and national innovation awards.
